price: Bityo, Allah asumba byose, Umwami w’ukuri; nta yindi mana ikwiye gusengwa by’ukuri uretse We, Nyagasani wa Ar’shi[1] y’icyubahiro.
arabic: فَتَعَٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمَلِكُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡكَرِيمِ
footnotes: [1] Reba uko twasobanuye iri jambo muri Surat ul A’araf: 54.

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fataʿālā al-lahu al-maliku al-ḥaqu lā ilāha illā huwa rabbu al-ʿarshi al-karīmi
